name: Speed Race
description:
SPEED RACE IS THE COOLEST TOP-DOWN RACING GAME.

Try your racing skills and earn coins to upgrade to faster and better cars. Complete each level before your time's up and avoid crashes. Beware other cars and obstacles.

FEATURES:
* Eye-popping graphics
* Easy and responsive touch controls
* Innovative and amazing gameplay
* Progressive game based on levels

CONTROLS:
Touch right or left field of the screen to accelerate or brake respectively. Orientate your device to direct your car left or right.
